meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be shut; to close; to be closed esp. 閉まるあいにく店は閉まっていた。Unfortunately, the store was closed.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be firm (of a body, face, etc.); to be well-knit Only applies to 締まるドアが閉まっていたので、入ることが出来なかった。The door was locked, so I couldn't get in.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be locked

meanings.meaning: 4. to tighten; to be tightened

meanings.meaning: 5. to become sober; to become tense

meanings.meaning: 1. hard; solid; tough esp. 固い and 堅い for wood, 硬い for metal and stone卵は硬くゆでてください。Boil the eggs hard.
2. stiff; tight; wooden; unpolished (e.g. writing) このふたは固くて取れないよ。This lid is too tight for me to open.
3. strong; firm (not viscous or easily moved) その機械の骨組みは堅くなければならない。The frame of the machine should be rigid.
4. safe; steady; honest; steadfast
5. obstinate; stubborn
6. bookish; formal; stuffy Antonym: 砕けた固いこと言うなよ。You don't have to be so formal.
固い 【かたい】、堅い 【かたい】、緊い 【かたい】
緊い: Irregular kanji usage.
1. hard; solid; tough esp. 固い and 堅い for wood, 硬い for metal and stone卵は硬くゆでてください。Boil the eggs hard.
2. stiff; tight; wooden; unpolished (e.g. writing) このふたは固くて取れないよ。This lid is too tight for me to open.
3. strong; firm (not viscous or easily moved) その機械の骨組みは堅くなければならない。The frame of the machine should be rigid.
4. safe; steady; honest; steadfast
5. obstinate; stubborn
6. bookish; formal; stuffy Antonym: 砕けた固いこと言うなよ。You don't have to be so formal.
固い 【かたい】、堅い 【かたい】、緊い 【かたい】
緊い: Irregular kanji usage.

sentences.translation: This lid is too tight for me to open.
The frame of the machine should be rigid.
You don't have to be so formal.

meanings.meaning: 1. tension; strain; nervousness; stress 「僕、飛行機に乗るのはこれが初めてなんだ。緊張するよ」と博がいいます。"This is my first flight. I'm nervous," says Hiroshi.
2. tensions (between countries, groups, etc.) 冷戦の緊張が高まった。Cold-war tension has mounted.
3. tonus; muscle tone Physiology

3. tonus; muscle tone Physiology

sentences.translation: "This is my first flight. I'm nervous," says Hiroshi.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
meanings.meaning: 1. urgency; emergency

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
meanings.meaning: 1. urgency; emergency
1. tough; hard; severe; demanding; harsh フーッ、この坂道はきついよ。でも帰りは楽だよね。Whew! This is a tough hill. But coming back sure will be a breeze.
2. determined; strong-minded; forceful; formidable; fierce
3. strong (e.g. sunlight, alcohol); severe; intense トムは頭にきつい一発を受けた。Tom received a heavy blow on the head.
4. (too) tight; constricting; close ちょっとウエストがきついね。The waist is a little small.
5. extreme; unusually strong
キツイ

sentences.translation: Whew! This is a tough hill. But coming back sure will be a breeze.
Tom received a heavy blow on the head.
